sources.title: Panther's Claw, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Panther's Claw (1942) CRIME-MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Sidney Blackmer, Rick Vallin, Byron Foulger 
 Director: William Beaudine

 In the first of a planned series of films based on Foulton Osler's stories, finds Police Commissioner Thatcher Colt and his aide, Anthony Abbott using their usual methods of science and deduction, set out to solve the murder of an opera singer. This involves two wig-makers, an opera troupe, an announcement of a trip to South America, and an artful disguise.

sources.title: The Panther's Claw (1942) Crime, Mystery Full Length Movie
sources.description:
The police arrest a man climbing over the wall of a cemetery after midnight. He claims that he is being blackmailed and is following instructions he received by mail to leave $1000 on a certain grave. It turns out that he's not the only one who got a blackmail letter.

Director: William Beaudine
Writers: Fulton Oursler, Martin Mooney 
Stars: Sidney Blackmer, Rick Vallin, Byron Foulger 
Genres: Classics Crime, Mystery

metadata.Plot: The police arrest a man climbing over the wall of a cemetery after midnight. He claims that he is being blackmailed and is following instructions he received by mail to leave $1000 on a certain grave. It turns out that he's not the only one who got a blackmail letter from the same person--calling himself "The Black Panther"--and it also turns out that all the recipients are connected to an opera company.
metadata.Actors: Sidney Blackmer, Rick Vallin, Byron Foulger
